hadith.text: It was narrated from Nasr bin 'Abdur-Rahman, from his grandfather Mu'adh, that he performed Tawaf with Mu'adh bin 'Afra' but he did not pray. "I said:'Are you not going to pray?' He said: 'The Messenger of Allah (ï·º) said: 'There is no prayer after 'Asr until the sun has set, nor after Subh until the sun has risen
